com.hannesdorfmann.mosby3

Interface FragmentMviDelegate<V extends MvpView,P extends MviPresenter<V,?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - The type of MvpView
    P - The type of MvpPresenter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FragmentMviDelegateImpl

    public interface FragmentMviDelegate<V extends MvpView,P extends MviPresenter<V,?>>
    A delegate for Fragments to attach them to mosby mvp.

    The following methods must be invoked from the corresponding Fragments lifecycle methods:

    • onCreate(Bundle)
    • onDestroy()
    • onPause()
    • onResume()
    • onStart()
    • onStop()
    • onViewCreated(View, Bundle)
    • onActivityCreated(Bundle)
    • onSaveInstanceState(Bundle)
    • onAttach(Activity)
    • onDetach()

    Since:
    3.0.0
